Serialized Fields

actionBefore13

javax.swing.Action actionBefore13
The action to be executed by this menu item. This is only used when running in a version of Java prior to 1.3, where this feature didn't exist. In 1.3 and up, this functionality is built-in and this is not used.

actionPropertyChangeListener

java.beans.PropertyChangeListener actionPropertyChangeListener
The object that listens for property change events coming from the action attached to the menu item. This is only used when running in a version of Java prior to 1.3.

The user frames of this menu item.
